1.content:
Welcome to Hogwarts, School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

Over this past summer The Ministry of Magic, in response to the demographic crisis, has instituted a new policy placing all female student eligible for consumption, by either the student body, the faculty, the staff, or the many magical creatures in and about the castle. The staff and faculty generally only eat girls as disciplinary action, but the students are another story. They are in fierce competition to protect the girls from their own house as they try to kidnap girls from other houses, either to eat, or feed to monsters:

Every girl who is captured and devoured legitimately counts for a point for the capturing student's house and against the kidnapped girls house. She also provide much entertainment to that house as they are she in a feast or fed to someone's pet, sometimes after being ravaged by the student that captured her. However, this is not a complete free-for-all. There are a number of rules and restrictions in place to prevent complete chaos - for girls to count towards the point total, they must be captured legally. Moreover, violating these rules also brings strict punishments, as described below:

The rules of this new policy, as well as other aspects of this world, are as follows: (Don't be daunted by the amount of detail - I'm just trying to give you a sense of what kind of world this is. I'm more interested in the spirit of the rule - if you need to have an exception made, just come up with a decent sounding reason).



POPULATION:
At any given time, the population of the school is roughly 50/50 male/female. Since there are so many surplus girls in the general population, new girls get transferred in as others are eaten.

MENU:
Only girls are on the menu. This rule is absolute and enforced by binding magic, and applies even outside of Hogwarts.

SAFETY: Girls do have some limited protections: the following rules are not enforced by magic, but rather by the faculty, staff, and prefects:
a) Students MAY NOT enter other houses unless invited by a student from that house.
b) Girls may not be eaten in their own houses (ie, Gryffindor tower, Ravenclaw Tower, Slytherin Dungeon, Hufflepuff Basement), unless their prefects allow it (usually theu won't, because of the house cup, as well as house loyalty).
c) Girls may not be captured or eaten in the Main halls (which provide access to the classrooms). They also may not be captured or eaten in class, unless their teacher AND the head of their own house (i.e. McGonagall, Snape, Sprout, or Flitwick) sign off on it.

DUELING: Anywhere else in the castle, the rule is that you may capture a girl, but only if you challenge her to a duel first (which she HAS to accept). Any companion of hers within a 15 foot radius may fight in her place to protect her, however. If the challenger is male, he may not make the challenge without a WILLING stand-in offering to be "collateral".
The winner gets the loser (or the girl they were protecting or using for collateral, if they are male), so one way or another, a girl will be captured by someone. At that point ,a binding spell is placed on that girl, and she may be taken away by the victor of the fight, usually to the victor's House where she can be chained up. If someone wants to rescue her (or poach her), and they are still in the castle, then they have to make ANOTHER challenge (and so if they are a guy, they must provide ANOTHER girl, who also must be willing, as collateral. As you can imagine, its hard to convince a second girl to be your collateral when the first one just got taken away to someone/something's dinner).

NO MAN'S LAND: Outside the castle it's a free-for-all, so anyone can try to kidnap girls EXCEPT during organized events, like herbology class, quidditch, etc... Of course, these events have their own dangers...

RULE VIOLATIONS:
If students fail to follow the rules, or start failing classes, or does any other serious offense, and are caught, then the punishment varies depending on their gender:
A girl found in violation is generally sentenced to be eaten in some way - either fed to monsters for entertainment (and to keep them from going hungry), served at a feast, given to the house of the girl she illegally attacked, etcetera.
If a guy breaks the rule, he can be expelled, or possibly have a restraining spell put on him to keep him from eating ANY girls for some amount of time. It may even be decided that a girl from his house, or even a sister or cousin, has to pay the price.
HOWEVER, in all cases, the offending student (male or female) is innocent until proven guilty - so if a 5th year student snatches a little first year girl from the main hallways when no one's looking, or grabs someone elsewhere without making a formal challenge, and doesn't get cuaght, he's fine. As long as no one can prove conclusively that he took a girl illegally, he's fine (remember, he can always say he caught her outside, unless she can prove otherwise.)

CAPTIVE GIRLS:
As long as the above rules are followed, students may do what they want with their captives, which often means rape, followed by (or even simultaneously with) a feast or feeding her to a monster for fun. However, girls can also be used in a prisoner exchange, or held as a slave for a little while. If they aren't eaten before the end of the year, they will go free and not count towards the house cup, so although some girls are kept as slaves for awhile, they are almost always eaten within a few weeks - since they will be eaten anyway, its better to avoid the risk of them escaping (plus each house has only limited space for holding captives)

SEX:
Sex between students is allowed, (after all, life is short). An unbreakable birth control/protection spell has been placed on all the girls, so there is no risk of pregnancy or STDS. Captured girls may be raped.

QUIDDITCH:
The Quidditch teams are required to have at least 3 girls on the team at all times. The winner of each match gets to take their pick of the losing team's girls as a victory feast. There are also sometimes hazards during the game itself - the game can be played over a pit of monsters, or with dragons flying around the air. And of course, the penalty box almost always has a fun surprise.

PREFECTS:
House prefects have considerable authority. Often, they get to decide which girls are sacrificed when their house is punished. Technically they have discretion over the use of all captured girls (with any disputes among prefects resolved by the, though in practice, a girl is usually given to the one who captured her to do as he or she pleases, unless there is a pressing need for her (e.g. in a prisoner exchange), since the prefects like to keep morale up. As mentioned above, they can also put girls in their own houses on the menu as a way to punish them, or their friends, for disloyalty. Students can appeal to the head of the house if this is abused, though such abuse is rare, on account of the prefects' interest in keeping morale up.

THE HOUSE CUP:
The house cup is given to the house that has the highest score, evaluated by taking the number of girls they have eaten from other houses, and subtracting the girls that have been eaten from their own house. This gives them incentive to protect their own girls. The winning house is given a feast, consisting of a number of the losing houses' girls, generally selected from that house, with one exception: the winning prefects each get the privilege of selecting any girl he or she wants from the entire female population of the lowest scoring house. This is often the only practical way to get their hands on a rival prefect (or rival prefect's girlfriend, if the rival is male), and so the prefects tend to be especially fanatical about winning.

COMARADERIE:
In each house, there is also in each house a sense of camaraderie, and the male students tend to feel particularly protective of the girls in their house. While this isn't universal - there are always somewhat disloyal exceptions, the general attitude is that they are all in this together against the other houses, and particularly their rivals. (That DOESN'T mean I want to discourage you from having Harry or Ron eat Hermione, or something like that. Just make sure that you come up with a plausible explanation, e.g., they have a falling out, or whatever - and other people in the same house wouldn't shrug it off - there might be consequences). If you really want, I guess you can put a character in a different house if that makes it easier.


I think that's about it. Like I said, don't feel too confined by the rules - they are guidelines to give you some place to start, so if you feel like you need to deviate from them, just make up a reason. For example, you may have faculty women get eaten also, but just give it a good explanation, like she committed a firing offense, or a monster got loose, or something like that. After all, accidents happen.


Now to start, what year, i.e., which book does the story take place in? Make sure that the ages of characters correspond to their ages in that book.

One idea which you don't have to do, but will make things interesting, is to take plot ideas from the actual books and give them a vore/cannibal twist - Maybe the Chamber of secrets is opened, just like in the books, but rather than turning people to stone, well, let's just say you can probably imagine what the Basilisk is doing in this Interactive.

You may also set the book at the time James, Lilly, Snape, et al are in school. You can even put it in the time when Voldemort was a student if you want.
1.title: Welcome to Hogwarts

11.content: Who is the main character?
11.title: Philosopher's stone

111.content:
Choose which character.

If you want, you can add your own choice, but if you do, YOU MUST write the first chapter for the character you add.

If you add your own new character, You must ALSO make the other choice "More options" to give others the chance to add.
111.title: Male student

1111.content:
October 31st, 1981

"Fancy Seeing you here, Professor McGonagall"

The tabby cat looked up at the towering wizard above her. Rather abruptly, the cat transformed into a rather stern looking witch.

"Headmaster," she replied curtly.

"Minerva, I'm afraid I have some terrible news."

"Yes, I know, the Potters. Oh, poor James and Lilly, if we ever find who betrayed them, I swear I'll-'

"Professor, that is not why I'm here."

"Oh. Oh dear, do you mean to tell me that You-Know-Who is still at large?"

The elderly wizard sighed, his tired eyes making him appear older than he was - a rather impressive feat for a man who just recently celebrated his centennial.

"No, I'm afraid it's even worse than that. You recall how Voldemort fancied himself to be the heir of Slytherin?"

"Yes, but it's absurd for anyone to think they could trace that back 1000 years. Clearly he was delusional."

"Unfortunately, my sources as the Ministry tell me that he was in fact correct."

"And they know this, how, exactly?"

"It seems that there were, hidden away in the Department of Mysteries, a number of documents indicating that Slytherin placed a rather unusual curse on the Wizarding world before he died. If an heir were ever to take up his noble work, then ancient magics would become active, severely altering the ratio between male and female births, in favor of females. We know neither why nor how he did this, though we speculate that it had something to do with a plan to breed a new, purer race of wizards. But whatever the cause, it appears that Voldemort was that heir, and the curse was activated a few years ago, though only now has it reached what we think to be it's peak, where it will likely remain. The effects are going to be devastating."

McGonagall chuckled. "Now Dumbledore, I realize you don't swing that way, but surely this is not quite the catastrophe you're making it out to be."

Dumbledore chuckled gently, but his face remained somber.

"No, I'm afraid it is. The ministry has already determined that to maintain the balance, and prevent a complete demographic explosion, some girls will have to be eliminated"

"Oh Albus, you can't mean Euthanasia?"

"I might have favored such a solution, actually, rather than what the ministry is contemplating. As of right now, they don't have the political will, but soon, mark my words, they'll have legalized the most terrible things - cannibalism, feeding young girls to monsters, you name it. And we'll have to go along with it. All of us. Including them. Including him," Dumbledore concluded, as a large man on a motorcycle carrying an infant in his arms. "To think, after surviving such horror, he and his friends will have to see their friends, girlfriends, even sisters devoured alive in front of them.

"But enough of that. Let us tend to young Harry..."


Nearly ten years later...
1111.title: The Boy who Lived

11112.content:
Harry followed Hagrid as he walked down Diagon alley with his new school stuff, looking around at the world he now inhabited.
"'ere Harry," Hagrid said. "It's getting late; I'll buy you something to eat. What would you like?"
"I don’t know," he said, having never been asked his opinion of food before.
"I Know, I’ll buy you a girl to eat," he said steering him to a small parlour opposite Olivanders.
"What?" he asked
"Oh, a law passed three years ago means that any young girls you come across are allowed to be eaten," Hagrid said. "That includes the girls you're goin to school with, though there are rules bout that. Ones bought here in the alley you can eat here."
Harry's head was reeling from the information and he sat down without comment.
"Ere we are!" Hagrid said as the waiter brought over a menu.
Looking down the list there were pictures of girls that he could eat and he chose one at random. A few minutes later two bound and gagged young girls around his own age with long black hair and blue eyes was brought to the table.
Hagrid immediately grabbed one and lifted her up over his head before lowering her feet into his mouth. He swallowed and brought the girls knees into his mouth in spite of the young female’s struggles and muffled screams. He gulped at her again, bringing her hips into his mouth and a noticeable bulge in his neck showing where the child’s feet and legs were. Another swallow and she was up to her chest and her arms were inside, tucked to her sides as she looked pleadingly at harry. Another swallow and her head disappeared in Hagrid's mouth and it closed before a final swallow.
"Um I’ve never done this," Harry said embarrassed.
“It’s easy,” he replied. “Just open your mouth wide and take her head in, then swallow until she’s all the way down in your stomach.”
Harry looked at the girl who was quivering and thought ‘what the heck’. He moved forward and opened his mouth wide, taking the girls head into his mouth. She tasted GREAT! He rolled her head around his mouth as he tasted her, before gulping at her, taking up to her shoulders into his mouth and bringing her head into his throat. The next few minutes were spent licking and swallowing the girl until he got to her waist. Then he threw his head back and used gravity to assist as he swallowed again and again until finally her feet slipped into his mouth and with a final swallow she was curled up in his belly.
“That was great!” he gasped feeling incredibly full and aroused.
“Eating girls is a wonderful feeling,” Hagrid chuckled. “Come on now, we’ll just disguise that bulge and let her digest. You’ll enjoy your first, everyone does.”
11112.title: Diagon Alley

choices: They go check out the other room to see who screamed.
They follow their noses to the dining car.
11113.content:
Damn, this thing itches.

Harry Potter rubbed his scar. Usually it didn't bother him, but today, for some reason, it was out of control.

Much like the people in the next compartment. What could they possibly be making so much noise over? And what was that smell? Whatever it was, it smelled good. Harry was about to get up and look, when he noticed someone at the door.

"This seat taken?"

Harry looked up. A tall, red-haired boy, covered in freckles, was standing before him, gesturing toward the seat.

"Um, no, have a seat," he replied.

"Thanks, I'm Ron, by the way. Ronald Weasley," the freckled boy replied

Harry smiled at the boy. He seemed friendly enough.

"Harry Potter?"

"That's right, how did you know?"

"The scar's kind of a dead giveaway. So you must have all kinds of stories to tell."

"Not really - I grew up not even knowing I was a wizard. I don't know much about this world at all. And what is that smell. It smells delicious!

"Or who."

"Yeah, who knows, maybe they're cannibals," laughed Harry, until he saw that Ron's face was dead serious.

Wait, you are kidding, right? Wizards don't really eat people, do they?"

"Wow, you really don't know anything," Ron blurted out, then quickly realized his error as Harry began to looked a bit abashed. "I'm sorry, I didn't mean to make a big deal about it. It's just, there's been a lot of major changes happening in the wizarding world, and I can't believe no one told you about them!"

"Well, they probably did, but my uncle shredded most of their letters, and I guess Hagrid might have forgotten to tell me some things - he seemed like he might be a bit forgetful."

"Hmmm, yeah, I guess it's easy to forget these little details like the fact that girls are allowed to be eaten!", Ron exclamed.

Harry didn't know what to think or feel. He was quickly overcome, first with shock, and a bit of fear, but then it was mostly just confusion, curiousity, and the tiniest bit of titillation.

"I guess we have a lot to talk about". And so Ron patiently explained all of the things that you, dear reader, already read about in the first chapter.

.....

"Wow," said Harry about an hour and a half later.

"Yeah, well, it's sort of new for all of us. And while eating some girls might be fun, I wouldn't want it happening to my little sister." Ron shuddered at the very thought. "Still, it is what it is. Now let's go see what other people are up to."

At this point, the raucous sounds from the neighboring car had become almost deafening, and were accompanied by a high pitched scream. Ron sighed "Don't people know you aren't allowed to eat girls on the train? Everyone deserves a chance to at least get sorted first"

"Shouldn't we go see what's going on in there?"

"I don't know, Harry, maybe it's best to mind our own business. And anyway, I'm curious about that smell. I could swear it's human meat, but a student would be mad to try to cook a girl here. You'd be expelled before you even got to the castle!"
11113.title: The train ride

choices: Draco and friends trying to feed Parvati to a snake.
Some 4th year students having an orgy.
111131.content:
"Ron, I think we really should try to help whoever's in there. She could turn out to be another Gryffindor, like us, right?"

"Easy, there, Harry, I said I want us to be in Gryffindor. That doesn't mean we will be. It's all up to the hat. It has to decide whether you really are brave and not just..."

But Harry was already out the door.

"...stupid," Ron sighed, as he followed his new heroic friend.

Harry knocked on the door. No answer. He knocked harder.

"Go away!" a boy's voice shouted from inside. This was immediately followed by another high pitched scream.

That's it, we're going in, thought Harry. He steeled his resolve and reached for the doorknob. To his surprise, it was unlocked. Apparently it hadn't dawned on the geniuses inside that maybe they should lock the door before they go assaulting people.

He opened the door and found...
111131.title: Brave?  Or...

choices: Harry shows Draco the scar, and threatens him.
Harry tries to cast the only spell he remembers, from when he was an infant.
1111311.content:
Harry threw open the door, wand drawn. He had no idea what to do with it, it just seemed like the right thing to do. As he entered the compartment, he saw a pale boy looking on as what could only be described as thuggish sidekicks held a poor Indian girl down.

"Crabbe, Goyle, you idiots!" shouted the pale boy to one of the goons. "How could you forget to lock the door!"

"Sorry Draco," one of the boys said, as sheepishly as someone like him could. The girl screamed again, but her eyes weren't on any of the boys. Harry followed her terrified glance and saw a large snake. Perhaps more frightening than the creature itself was the pair of young female legs dangling from its mouth.


"Hey, what are you doing, you know the rules!" shouted Ron as he stumbled in behind his friend.

"Oh, great, another one," the pale boy sneered as he looked at Ron, turning his gaze momentarily from the snake. At this point, the creature's teeth were a bit bloody, having sunk deep into soft butt of the little girl in its maw. "Just how many of you are there, anyway?"

Ron seemed to bristle at that, though Harry wasn't sure what it meant. Meanwhile, Draco turned dismissively away from Ron to address Harry. "Is there something unclear about the words `Go Away?'"

Ron, undeterred, quipped "No, it's about as clear as `No eating girls on the train.'"

Harry, meanwhile, gazed in morbid fascination as the snake slurped the poor girl in further, so that only her young calves were visible. He could hear muffled screaming and sobbing coming from inside, and found himself at once both revolted and aroused. He could definitely see himself getting used to this. But he had come in here to help these girls, and besides, this boy and his friends really rubbed him the wrong way. He made up his mind.

"Ron, run get a teacher," he said.

"But - "

"Just Go".

Ron did as he was told. Harry, wand still out, turned to Draco, who by this time had also drawn his weapon.

"Let the girl go."

"Don't be such a prissy. What are you going to do, cast a spell? Put the wand down, do you even know how to use it?

The boy had a point. Harry really didn't have any idea what he was doing. It looked like it was already too late for the first girl - her feet were about all that was left of her, other than a struggling bulge in the serpent's belly. But the Indian girl still needed help, and despite his bravado, Draco seemed nervous. He appeared to be about Harry's own age. Maybe he didn't know what he was doing either?

I'm Harry Potter, thought Harry, I supposedly defeated Voldemort singlehandedly as an infant. I shouldn't have to worry about these losers.


Time to do something incredibly brave and/or stupid.
1111311.title: Rushing in where Gryffindors fear to tread

11113112.content:
He remembered the green flash of light thatt had plagued his dreams for as long as he had remembered and pointed his wand carefully at the snake. he focussed intently and a jet of green light shot out of the end of his wand, striking the serpent between its eyes. the massive snake, complete with it's meal slumped as the curse hit it all its muscles relaxing at the same time. harry watched in surprise as the curse had an unexpected effect; he had thought the girl in its belly was beyond saving, but when the muscles holding her relaxed in death, she slid out naked and landed in a heap on the floor shaking and crying.
turning his attention back to Malfoy, he saw that Draco was white as a sheet having seen Harry Potter casually cast a Killing Curse on his snake to save the girl in its stomach. at that moment Ron and a teacher ran in.
"What is the meaning of this?" she demanded her nostrils flaring and her mouth becoming extremely thin.
"We heard the screams coming from this compartment," Harry began. "We came in and saw that that snake there," he gestured to the dead serpent. "Was eating her while the other girl was pinned down, presumably to be eaten next. i killed the snake and she slid out of the snakes mouth."
"What spell did you use?" she asked surprised that there was no marks on the snake.
"I don't know what it is, i just know that it has green light," Harry said. the professor paled considerably. "It hit the snake in the head and it slumped down there. it was then that you ran in."
"Very- Very well," she said faintly. "Take the two girl-"
"Wait the snake is still moving," Ron said. "There is still someone in there!" and indeed there was, the slight twitching inside the dead snakes belly had gone unnoticed until now but there was still someone inside.
"Accio!" the professor barked and the bulge at the end of the serpents body shot along the length of it and out its mouth. the girl was fairly tall, with bushy brown hair and was barely conscious, having been without much air inside the snake for so long.
"So mister Malfoy, Crabbe, Goyle," she said. "What do you have to say for yourself? You know full well that eating or feeding girls on the train is forbiden!"
"But they're only mudbloods," he protested.
"Ones birth matters for nothing in magic Malfoy!" she barked. "For this you will all be expelled and your betrotheds given to these students for the opening feast!"
"And mister Potter, Do know that that curse is illegal to use on any fellow human being. its use gets life without parole even for one such as you."
Harry and Ron then ushered the slimy girls back into their compartment and cleaned them up.
11113112.title: Harry tries to cast the only spell he remembers...

choices: A small group of preteen girls skinny-dipping in a large pond.
Two clothed girls tied by their wrists, and hanging from a tree.
1252.content:
Authors note, in this version Aragog can clearly see his lovely prey.

On a warm May’s night, around nine O’clock, Aragog the giant spider was getting a bit bored. As a result, he decides to patrol his territory, just in case something interesting found its way into one of his webs, or was nearby. Aragog is currently leaving the main part of his colony, followed by none of his many children, and stealth-fully climbs up a huge tree, then moves through the foliage without making a sound. Then with his ultra sensitive hearing, he suddenly stops, while he detects the sounds of the most delicious of meals, human females in distress nearby. He then slowly, yet carefully lowers himself to the ground, and cautiously moves toward the girl’s voices with deliberate predatory intent. Oh, he hoped they would be tender and young he thought to himself.

The last time he had a human was many years ago, and he remembered that incident with joy to this day. It was a night much like this, and as he patrolled his territory, he caught a young female human in his web that foolishly walked into the woods by herself, dressed in a brown uniform. He remembered the joy he felt at capturing her and the fear on her face as he questioned her. Her name was Tina, and she was just fourteen-years-old. He then remembered the shock on her cute little face as he slowly undressed her, and then examined her. He thought about how good her body felt, as he raped her several times, before he devoured her alive. Oh how versatile those lovely human meals are, food a monster could play with. A spider can satisfy both his lust and his hunger at the same time. Perhaps he should have brought a few of his sons with him, just to teach them the joys of a human female. As Aragog moves through the plants on the forest floor, still hidden by them, he sees with his many eyes…
1252.title: Aragog the Giant Spider is hunting!

choices: Lures them out of the water & into his web, one at a time?
12521.content:
While Aragog looks over at the pond with his many black eyes, he sees the most enjoyable sights that he has ever seen, swimming in the water below him. At the same time, he begins to grin evilly, as his fangs start to drool, and his old, ten-inch spider cock is beginning to harden very quickly. Oh, he cannot believe his luck, he thinks to himself. What could send an old giant spider into tears, and make him both hungry and horny at the same time. Well, it was not his wife. Below him was three extremely attractive, young female humans swimming nude in the water. As these slender young girls skinny-dipped, the old spider lustfully watched their tender nude bodies in the light of the full moon, splashing each other playfully.

While the old spider stood there, hidden behind some large shrubs, watching the naked girls intensely, he thought to himself that these girls must be young for human. He thought this because he could not see any pubic hair in-between their slender young legs. In addition, he could clearly see that these girls were starting to develop small, perky young breasts. He could also see their tender young ass cheeks bobbing in and out of the water as they splashed each other. He simply could not keep his many eyes away from those lovely, firm, bare ass cheeks of theirs. He then notices that two of the girls have white skin, one has golden blond hair, and the other has red hair, while the third girl has lit bronze skin, and dark hair. Damn them for being so gorgeous, he thinks to himself. The old spider then quickly, yet silently steals all of the girls clothes.

As nine-year-old Emily (the red head), ten-year-old Katy (the girl with the golden blond hair), and eleven-year-old Sasha (the Hispanic girl) play in the water, these young, nude, unarmed witches are unaware that their lives are in mortal jeopardy. The old spider...
12521.title: A giant spider & the 3 preteen girls!

choices: Emily and the old spider? Maybe Sasha too?
Katy and the Giant man? Maybe Sasha too?
125211.content:
As Aragog lustfully watches the three girls skinny-dipping the water with his big black eyes, he licks his lips and mandibles as the water runs over their naked young bodies. Not wanting to wait any longer, Aragog was determined to act, before it was too late. 15411.content:
this is the start of your fifth year at Hogwarts and things are starting to get weird. somehow there is a glut of witches out there and the solution the ministry put out is that all girls at Hogwarts are up for consumption. the rule was brought in just yesterday and James for one couldn't wait!

there were a huge number of girls that he wanted to shove down his throat and this was the first day that he could do so. When he got downstairs from the common room he was immediately approached by none other than Lilly Evans.

"James," she said softly. "Could you come over here for a minute, i want to ask you something."

"Sure," he replied casually and walked over to a corner. "So what do you need?"
15411.title: James Potter

154111.content:
James stared at her in astonishment sure he had not heard her correctly.
"I have always fantasised about someone eating me up and i was ecstatic when i heard that they had brought in this new rule and i thought that you would be the best person to do it," she said in a rush.
James didn't move or speak.
"It's alright if you don't want to..." she started but James cut her off.
"Of course i would!" he exclaimed. "I just never thought that you would want it!"
"That's great!" she cried. "Now it's breakfast time and you must be hungry, so lets go out into the halls so you can devour me."
James led the way out of the portrait hole and through the corridores to the fourth floor. on the way he came accross a group of fifth year Slytherins who had cornered a poor first year Ravenclaw.
"I challenge you for your body," the biggest, one Cius Flint declared. "And no-one is here to fight for you so you'll have to do it yourself and that means i've got some good food and fucking here."
the poor girl looked petrified as the three boys and three girls towered over her with hungry expressions.
"She does have soemone to fight for her," James spoke up. "And who are you putting up for collateral?"
Flint looked surprised and flicked his eyes over the waiting girls.
"Black," he said simply gesturing to Sirius' psychotic cousin before drawing his wand and sending a curse at James. James ducked like lightning and retaliated with a series of stunners, blasting curses and jinxes. Flint who was rather slow in the brains department had just blocked the first stunner before he was hit in the face with a blasting curse and was catapulted the length of the corridor and smashed through the tapestry there and vanished.
he turned to Bellatix and said "i claim my prize."
Bellatrix glowered as her magic flashed to signify that she was a captured girl.
He gestured for the first year to follow him and led the trio of girls away.
154111.title: "i want you to eat me."

1541111.content:
James pulled the three girls into the space behind the mirror on the fourth floor but not before Lilly whispered into his ear that she wanted to see him eat the other two girls and if he did she would fuck him as much as he wanted.
he turned to the 'claw and said "I couldn't have those Slytherins eating you now could i?"
the little girl shook her head looking at him gratefully until he spoke again. "That's for me to do!"
"No Please!" she cried but to no avail. with a wave of his wand he vanished her clothes and grabbed her by her arms, lifting her up into the air towards his maw.
the little claw was screaming her head off as she saw the older boys mouth open in front of her before she was stuffed in. her screams were muffled by the flesh that surrounded her head and her flailing arms were kept in check by James' powerful hands. slowly he licked over her face before gulping at her pulling her head into the open tunnel that was his throat. on the outside Lilly watched in fascination as James gulped at the tiny girl her luscious shoulders sliding into his open maw and her feet flailing desperately. it was a HUGE turn on to watch the girl be devoured like this and she knew that soon enough it would be her sliding down his enormous gullet into his sexy belly.
by now the girl was up to her stomach in james, her head near the opening of his belly and her desperate pleas for mercy went unnoticed. James simply lapped at her chest and stomach as his hands pushed into the girls thighs, feeling the meat of his meal before deciding to give the girl some last pleasure. he pushed his hand firmly into the childs pussy, hearing the agonized scream from inside him as he swallowed again, bringing her thighs in. his hand moved in and out of her and the girl sobbed in him as he swallowed again bringing her in up to her knees forcibly removing his hand from her core. by now Lilly was furiously pumping her own pussy, wet as a watering can watching the little girl being gulped down into James' stomach. finally with a long slurp James pulled the last of the naked girl down into his digestion chamber, listening to the desperate sobs of his victim.
1541111.title: eat the little girl

15413.content: Maybe one of the other Marauders?
15413.title: More Options

154131.content:
Sirius's Fifth Year was just beginning. Over The summer, the ministry had made an announcement: there was a glut of witches out there. Therefore, all witches were up for consumption. The new rule was brught in yesterday, and Sirius couldn't wait until he could start.

There were several witches tha Sirius wanted to eat, some of which he knew he would have to be careful to avoid being found out. After all, Lily Evans might look tasty, but if he ate somebody from his house, then it would earn him the scorn of his housemates. Plus, he would still need to defeat her.

Similarly, his cousins, Andromeda, Narcissa and Bellatrix might look appaetising, but he would find it difficult to defeat them in a duel.

Sirius was walking down a corridor, when he was pulled into an abandoned classroom.

Who was it?
154131.title: Sirius Black?

15413111.content:
Sirius saw that it was his cousin Andromeda who had pulled him into an abandoned classroom. Looking at her, Sirius was mentally licking his lips. his cousins might be Slytherins, but they all looked hot and tasty. He was impatient to find out what his cousin wanted, since he was late to breakfast, and was hungry. " What do you want, Andy? I'm missing brekafast." He asked his cousin.

"You know I have been dating Ted Tonks for the past two years" Andy asked Sirius
"Yes..." Sirius replied, wondering where this was going
"I discovered last night that he was murdered by my parents." Andromeda told him. "Now, I want revenge. Will you help me?" Andromeda asked Sirius.
"That depends on what you want me to do and what's in it for me, Andy." Sirius replied, wondering what his usually kind cousin wanted him to do.
" I want you to capture and eat Narcissa and Bellatrix. The loss of their favourite daughters would be my revenge." Andromeda replied.
"And what's in it for me? Sure, Narcissa and Bellatrix look tasty, but they'll be tricky to capt
15413111.title: Andromeda

154131111.content:
" I will allow you to capture and eat me too" Andromeda replied to Sirius.
"You're serious?" Sirius said, shocked. never had he suspected his cousin would offer herself. "Why? Why would you offer to let me ea you if I eat Narcissa and Bellatrix?"
"What do I have to live for? All I can look forward too is be an unwilling wife to a pureblood prince. I'd rather die" Andromeda said calmly. " Do you agree, or do I need to ask somebody else?" Andromeda added.
" Of course I agree!" Sirius replied.
"OK, Now, it's breakfast, so I know you'll be hungry. I know where Bellatrix and Narcissa are, so lets get them for breakfast." Andromeda said.
"Where are they?" Sirius asked.
"Under Stunning Spells next door" Andromeda replied, smirking. " Do you think I would risk them escaping? I will Enervate Narcissa, you can duel and capture her, then we'll do the same to Bellatrix."
154131111.title: extra meal

1541311111.content:
"Ok, let's start, as you said, I'm hungry" Sirius said
Andromeda didn't reply, she just walked to a door Sirius hadn't noticed when he came in. Opening it, she walked through. " Come on, then." she said.
walking to the door, Sirius stepped through. looking around, he saw that the room appeared to be a bedroom. Raising an eyebrow at Andromeda, she replied " I don't know why there's a bedroom here. I found it a while ago, and thought you'd prefer to use it for this. Who do you want to capture first?" Andromeda asked.
1541311111.title: agree

15413111112.content:
"Let's get Bellatrix captured first, she's the most dangerous of the two" Sirius said.
They both walked over to Bellatrix, Andromeda enervating her, followed by Sirius saying " I challenge you for your body" followed by a Stunning spell aimed at Bellatrix. The challenge won, Bellatrix scowled as her magic flashed to indicate she was captured.
15413111112.title: Bellatrix

154131111122.content:
"Narcissa now" Sirius said, walking over to his second cousin. Andromeda then enervated her, but Sirius wasnt' quite fast enough in gettring her, ending up duelling Narcissa.

five minutes later, Sirius won. Narcissa scowled as her magic flashed, indicating that she too was captured.

"You two didn't think I woudn't et my revenge for Ted's death, did you?" Andromeda said to her sisters, smiling as they scowled. finally, she would have her revenge as she got to watch her sisters get eaten.
154131111122.title: capture Narcissa first.

info.brief_description: An ancient curse forces Dumbledore to place the young witches of Hogwarts on the menu.
info.description:
Welcome to the latest perverted twist on J. K. Rowling's beloved universe.

This is a vore/cannibalism interactive, with a good amount of other grossly offensive stuff, so if you're the type to be eaily offended or upset, are underage, or are otherwise forbidden by laws in your area to view this content, now's the time to bail.

Also, keep in mind that this is a FANTASY. While a lot of this stuff would be physically impossible in the real world, to the extent that it would be, it would be illegal, but much more importantly, grossly immoral. Real death, rape, and other violence just leaves an empty hole in someone's life, and emptiness isn't much of a turn on. If you actually find yourself wanting to do any of this stuff for real, then you need to get out of my interactive and seek serious help.




Still here? Excellent. (I think)

The basic premise of this interactive is, that through a 1000 year old curse of Salazar Slytherin (who else?), the female population in the wizarding world has exploded - the ratio of girls to boys born is something ridiculous like 6 to 1 (or whatever ratio is consistent with the amount of girls getting eaten).

Why did Slytherin put the curse into effect? Who knows? Maybe he was mad at the world and wanted to cause some chaos. Maybe it had something to do with a plan to breed a master race of uberwizards. Or maybe he was just into cannibalism and vore, and anticipate the response of the Ministry of Magic.

And what was this response? Quite simply, to place females on the menu. The school rules and general description are laid out in the first chapter, and you should read those carefully to get a feel for what kind of setting this is, but the content restrictions are as follows:

ALLOWED: oral vore (soft AND hard), cannibalism, sex (straight or lesbian, all ages), incest, rape, nudity, shrinking (girls only, and only to a size at or above 3 inches tall - what good is a shrunken girl if she's so tiny you can't even taste her?)

FORBIDDEN: regeneration (i.e., coming back from the dead), scat, gay sex, non-oral vore (e.g. unbirth, cock vore, anal vore), anything to do with pregnancy, including milk, size change of any kind (other than described above), including weight gain or breast enlargement. Also, shrunken girls are for eating, not crawling into other orifices. Yeah, I know, I'm no fun.

Nothing against people who are into any of those things on the forbidden list - they just happen to be turn-offs for me, and I don't want to be turned off by my own interactive. I'm just weird that way.

Here are a few other rules. Please follow them, to make sure the story doesn't suck.


1. ADDING CHARACTERS/ AVOIDING ONE-LINE CHAPTERS:

I don't like one-line chapters much. At the very beginning you need a few, some of which I've put in place already, but even then I'd rather keep it to a minimum. So here's the rule: EVERY time you create an option to choose a character, you MUST write the first chapter of that characters' story, with at least 8 sentences for the first chapter of that character's story.

If you want, you can also make a short initial chapter for the character with two choices (e.g., Start in the common room or Start on the Quidditch field, or something of that sort), and follow up one of the choices IMMEDIATELY with a real 8-sentence chapter. But if you do that, post the longer chapter within 24 hours, so I know not to delete the shorter one. And once the story has started, every chapter should have at least 8 sentences.

Also, when adding a new initial character, you MUST make the second option "someone else?", to allow others to join in. (NOTE: this only applies to adding characters. During the story itself, you get to decide both of the choices at the very end of your chapter).

Basically, I'm just trying to make sure people are actually participating in the story, and not cluttering it up with endless lists of characters, or strings of 2 sentence-long chapters, that make reading it a nightmare.

If Someone ELSE has taken the character you really really wanted to write about, however, don't despair: First, you can certainly join in the current story tree for that character. But also, there will be seven different years to pick at the very beginning, so if you want to start fresh, the best thing to do is just write about the character in a different year.

2. DON'T END THE STORY: Please do not end the story, though you yourself don't have to continue with that storyline - just write some options for someone else to pick it up in case they want to. If the main character just died, give options to pick up the same story from another character's point of view. That way, if someone else really likes that storyline, they can keep it going. But you MUST be consistent with what's happened before, so if someone got eaten in chapter 5, I better not see them frolicking around in chapter 10 (Remember, NO REGENERATION! Dead is Dead!).

3. DON'T KILL GIRLS UNLESS THEY ARE BEING EATEN: Otherwise it's just wasting food. I mean come on, people are starving in the third world!

4. CONSISTENCY: Please be consistent regarding the events that have happened in your storyline.

That's about it. Try to be as good as you can about spelling and grammar - I'm not going to beat people up over it, but if I see "HeMine get ate by ron LOLZ" then I might just have to delete your chapter, block you from my profile, and put a Jihad on you.

Alright, enough talk, let's eat!
